content: {"name": "Clarkston High/Communities in Schools", "alternate_name": "", "description": "food distribution days 10th oct , 21st nov, 19th dec, 9th jan, 13th feb, 13th march, 3rd april, 15th may", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "618 North Indian Creek Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Clarkston", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30021", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7933901, "longitude": -84.2373468}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 676-5302", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "20:15", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
